DataElement.preferredName: Patient Receive Drug Substance MATE1 MATE2-K Inhibition Or Induction Local Institution Drug Interaction Review And Adjustment Best Practice Eligibility Criteria Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded indicator as to whether medications been reviewed and adjusted for interactions as appropriate for local institutional practice if the patient is receiving any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity that are inhibitors or inducers of MATE1 and MATE2-K transporters as outlined in the clinical trial protocol in order to determine study eligibility.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Receive Pharmacologic Substance SLC47A1 wt Allele Or SLC47A2 wt Allele Inhibition Or Induction Local Institution Drug Interaction Review And Best Practice Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria

This allele, which encodes multidrug and toxin extrusion protein 1, is involved in solute transport of cationic drugs across brush border membranes._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses._Human SLC47A2 wild-type allele encodes multidrug and toxin extrusion protein 2, plays a role in both secretion of cationic drugs and excretion of toxic electrolytes through urine and bile._The interference with or prevention of an action or response._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses._The act of bringing about something._Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality._An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research._Alteration of the disposition and/or effect of a drug, owing to the presence of another factor._The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis._An article used to conjoin a word with a word._An informed treatment recommendation that is expected to be helpful to the greatest number of people within a certain patient group._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Receive Pharmacologic Substance SLC47A1 wt Allele Or SLC47A2 wt Allele Inhibition Or Induction Local Institution Drug Interaction Review And Best Practice Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria

Concepts.definition: To take, accept, or get something offered.

Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.

Human SLC47A1 wild-type allele is located in the vicinity of 17p11.2 and is approximately 84 kb in length. This allele, which encodes multidrug and toxin extrusion protein 1, is involved in solute transport of cationic drugs across brush border membranes. Mutations in this gene are associated with Smith-Magenis syndrome and lactic acidosis.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

Human SLC47A2 wild-type allele is located in the vicinity of 17p11.2 and is approximately 41 kb in length. This allele, which encodes multidrug and toxin extrusion protein 2, plays a role in both secretion of cationic drugs across brush border membranes and excretion of toxic electrolytes through urine and bile.
The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
The act of bringing about something.
Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.

An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.
Alteration of the disposition and/or effect of a drug, owing to the presence of another factor such as a second drug, or food.
The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
An informed treatment recommendation that is expected to be helpful to the greatest number of people within a certain patient group.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient is receiving any m
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is receiving any medications or substances that are inhibitors or inducers of MATE1 and MATE2-K transporters, have their medications been reviewed and adjusted for interactions as appropriate for local institutional practice?
